Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Akama Resort in Urangan (Hervey Bay), you'll be convenient to Reefworld Aquarium and Hervey Bay Botanic Garden. This 5-star resort is within the vicinity of Urangan Pier and Hervey Bay Historical Village Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 22 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Rooms have private furnished balconies. 105-cm LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and bicycles to rent. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge at scheduled times, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
